Containers.Description: Run a GOG Starbound Server [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/starbound[/b] This is where the where the Starbound files from GOG need to be placed[br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']Important[/span]:[br][br] You [i]must[/i] do the following steps.[br][br] Download the linux installer script from GOG onto a linux machine.[br][br] run unzip gog_starbound_*.sh[br][br] You'll find it extracted 3 folders: data, meta, and scripts.[br][br] Copy the files from data/noarch/* to the starbound folder that you're mounting in UnRaid.[br][br] [br][br] Note: you can, technically, use the steam files if you didn't purchase from GOG. I have never tested or tried it though. The files and folders you're looking for are: docs/ game/ support/ gameinfo start.sh Submit any issues here: https://github.com/miketweaver/docker-starbound-gog-server/issues[br][br]
